title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When trying to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
EB: The item should be selected successfully on the first attempt.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item for the first time.
